languages.text: Оный Вакемо был повинен в вооруженном мятеже, его и трех его уцелевших товарищей предали казни, доставив на Футфол и вышвырнув в шлюз таким образом, чтобы тела оказались на орбите станции.

The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.
languages.original_text: Оный Вакемо был повинен в вооруженном мятеже, его и трех его уцелевших товарищей предали казни, доставив на Футфол и вышвырнув в шлюз таким образом, чтобы тела оказались на орбите станции.

traits.locale_text: Said Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by throwing them into an airlock so that their bodies would be left in the station's orbit.

Said Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by throwing them into an airlock so that their bodies would be left in the station's orbit.

Said Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown into an airlock, so the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

Said Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown into an airlock, so the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

languages.text: 有传言说，弗拉魔被判处武装叛乱罪。他和他的三名同伙被带到落脚港，丢进了气闸里。这样，这些罪人的尸体就会留在空间站的轨道上，让所有人看到，以儆效尤。
languages.original_text: The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

traits.locale_text: 有传言说，弗拉魔被判处武装叛乱罪。他和他的三名同伙被带到落脚港，丢进了气闸里。这样，这些罪人的尸体就会留在空间站的轨道上，让所有人看到，以儆效尤。

languages.text: Der Vackemo wurde der bewaffneten Meuterei für schuldig befunden. Er und drei seiner Komplizen wurden nach Footfall gebracht und hingerichtet, indem sie aus einer Luftschleuse geworfen wurden, damit die Leichen für aller Augen sichtbar im Orbit der Station verblieben.
languages.original_text: The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

traits.locale_text: Besagter Vackemo wurde der bewaffneten Meuterei für schuldig befunden. Er und drei seiner Komplizen wurden nach Footfall gebracht und hingerichtet, indem sie aus einer Luftschleuse geworfen wurden, damit die Leichen für aller Augen sichtbar im Orbit der Station verblieben.

languages.text: Le Vackemo fut déclaré coupable de mutinerie armée. Lui et trois de ses complices furent ramenés à Castel et exécutés : on les jeta d'un sas pour que leurs cadavres tournent en orbite autour de la station à la vue de tous.
languages.original_text: The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

traits.locale_text: Le Vackemo fut déclaré coupable de mutinerie armée. Lui et trois de ses complices furent ramenés à Castel et exécutés : on les jeta d'un sas pour que leurs cadavres orbitent autour de la station à la vue de tous.

languages.text: Vackemo fue declarado culpable de motín armado. Junto a tres cómplices, se le trasladó a Paso, donde fue ejecutado por expulsión por esclusa para que el cuerpo permaneciera en la órbita de la estación como advertencia.
languages.original_text: The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

traits.locale_text: Dicho Vackemo fue declarado culpable de motín armado. Junto a tres cómplices, se le trasladó a Paso, donde fue ejecutado por expulsión por esclusa para que el cuerpo permaneciera en la órbita de la estación como advertencia.

languages.text: ヴァッケモは武装反乱の罪で有罪になった。彼と3人の共犯者はフットフォールに連行され、その遺体がステーションの軌道上に残って誰の目にも見れるようにと、エアロックから外へと放り出されるという形で処刑された。
languages.original_text: The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

traits.locale_text: ヴァッケモは武装反乱の罪で有罪になった。彼と3人の共犯者はフットフォールに連行され、その遺体がステーションの軌道上に残って誰の目にも見れるようにと、エアロックから外へと放り出されるという形で処刑された。

languages.text: Vackemo, silahlı isyana kalkışmaktan suçlu bulundu. O ve üç iş birlikçisi, Binliman'a getirildi ve cesetleri istasyonun yörüngesinde kalıp herkes tarafından görülebilsin diye hava kilidinden atılarak idam edildiler.
languages.original_text: The Vackemo was found guilty of armed mutiny. He and three of his accomplices were brought to Footfall and executed by being thrown out of an airlock so that the bodies would remain in the station's orbit for all to see.

traits.locale_text: Vackemo, silahlı isyandan suçlu bulundu. O ve üç iş birlikçisi Binliman'a getirildi ve cesetleri istasyonun yörüngesinde kalsın ve herkes tarafından görülebilsin diye hava kilidinden atılarak idam edildiler.
